entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:47 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:47 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:47 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
